About FFmpeg

Due to GitHubâ€™s 25 MB file upload limit, the FFmpeg binary cannot be included in this repository.

Before running the project, you need to download and install FFmpeg manually.

Download from:
ğŸ‘‰ https://ffmpeg.org/download.html

Prebuilt Windows binaries:
ğŸ‘‰ https://www.gyan.dev/ffmpeg/builds/

After downloading, add FFmpeg to your system PATH or place it inside the project directory and configure the path accordingly.
